name: Listened to Ep #160 - Mario Cristobal Is Here And Already Recruiting HARD

content.html:
Alex Donno and Larry Blustein break down a whirlwind of a week for the University of Miami. Mario Cristobal has been introduced as the next head coach. Donno & Blu break down what makes Mario special, what Miami’s objectives should be for next season, and how Mario can close out the 2022 recruiting class with just a week until early national signing day. Plus, who could Cristobal target for new assistant coaches and coordinators?

By 5 Rings: A Canes Thing
